description: dark clocktower with three shadowy sculptural figures standing beneath clock face
inscription: LLC in pencil: Cat 77 / 3 | LRC in pencil: OXX / D / (illegible) / 19 | on back in pencil: Odilon Redon - Lith org. (M77) / 3112
signed: LRC in the image: ODILON REDON | LLC below image in pencil: OR | bottom center in pencil: Une cloche battait dans la tour
title: Une cloche battait dans la tour (A bell was striking in the tower)
